inputs.name: referencePrice
inputs.description: Reference price obtained through DataFeed contract

inputs.name: sellAsset
inputs.description: Asset (as registered in Asset registrar) to be sold

inputs.name: buyAsset
inputs.description: Asset (as registered in Asset registrar) to be bought

inputs.name: sellQuantity
inputs.description: Quantity of sellAsset to be sold

inputs.name: buyQuantity
inputs.description: Quantity of buyAsset to be bought

abiDocs.name: isMakePermitted
abiDocs.notice: Checks if the makeOrder price is within maximum allowed deviation from reference price
